Steam is misleading a bit, I have hundreds of hours in Overwatch.

Overwatch 2 is a predatory cash grab that fails to deliver on the promises Blizzard made. Overwatch 1 went through years of content drought while supposedly new content for Overwatch 2 was being made only to have it pulled out from under us. Everything in the shop is overpriced to an insane degree and all the changes from the first game are superficial at best. 

Don't bother with this game, they clearly don't care about their customers or their game.

Overwatch 2 improves upon the elements that made OW1  so great. 5v5 makes the game much more fluid and eliminates the frustrations caused by many tank combo defining metas. the CC reduction has also been great benefit to gameplay as well as the elimination of 2CP. The Overwatch Devs have done a great job pumping life back into this game despite the mismanagement of their leadership in Blizzard. The game is not in a perfect spot, but i believe it is on a good trajectory to recover from its passed sins that all stemmed from the OW2 announcement back in 2018-2019 that never should have taken place. The delivery of product and past promises has been the games biggest issue, the actual product is great.

every season is more and more greedy. they literally only care about money. The artists, writers, and coders times have been wasted by corporate ass hats

The first button was to a shop with a lame battlepass, overpriced skins and low tier co-op missions locked behind a paywall.

Actually playing the game, it felt like a corpse of the old game I loved being puppeteered to get me to pay for a $28 skin in a game I already paid full price for. 

All the talent and passion left Blizzard long ago.

You have to be a certain type of deranged to support this game after Blizzard provided 0 updates about game status for 3 years then released an update that provided minimal content on the PVP side AND delayed the PVE by at least a year WHILE removing the skill trees and randomization that was promised and hyped up for years. Don't forget that Blizz is also CHARGING MONEY for the PVE in addition to the battlepass costs. 

OW had one of the better lootbox & content drops systems and all that got removed into paying incredibly high prices for skins too so it would be a better use of your time as a new player to pay like $15-30 for an older account loaded with cosmetics if youre a new player. 

OW1 was an amazing game and time flew playing it but OW2 can never get that charm back. Go pickup a souls game or doom eternal or some other PEAK GAMING EXPERIENCE during a steam sale for the $15-25 youd pay getting the battlepass + pve missions in OW2 youll enjoy it a lot more!
This is a sleazy cash grab. Bring back Overwatch 1.
